page.title: 03A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Giles Peplar is a fulltime headmaster with his own office. He talks with the staff & sees to the post before going to assembly. There he talks about punctuality & about the airdome sports hall that could fall down about any time now. At break he cracks a few jokes with the staff. From then on he works on his own, doing paperwork & getting phone calls. Meanwhile at Chaucer the late bell goes at 8.55am. If anyone comes to school after that they have to go in the late-book. We have Integrated Programme all Monday morning. At break we sometimes play football with the lads but we hardly ever get a kick of the ball. At lunchtime there is a cafeteria but usually I go to the chip shop or the bakery. We then have Geography which is OK & after break we have History which is fab.
